access.description: Add a security group to restrict access to the members of that group only.If you add multiple security groups, any member of the groups you have added will have access.Optionally, you may also add a required smart card security group. In that case, the user must be a member of at least one of the configured security groups AND a member of the smartcard security group.

Page1.Title: Welcome to Project Honolulu
Page1.Subtext: Project Honolulu is a new web-based management solution from Microsoft, built to modernize and simplify administration of your Windows datacenter.

Page2.Title: Help us build the future of Management
Page2.Subtext: We are building on and improving Project Honolulu, but we need your help to make sure it’s the best it can be. Click the link under the help section to send us feedback or suggestions. We look forward to hearing from you!
